body:
Hi. we have registered using driver `postgres` when using `Postgres` database.
Now we want to upgrade to `postgres12` driver.
How can I check if it requires a DB schema update?
If a schema update is needed, would it cause a downtime since we have roughly 50GB data on `Production`.
Thanks a lot. :gratitude-thank-you:
- Version Temporal Server: `1.22.1`

comments.body: There is no schema update needed between PostgreSQL versions.

title: Upgrade `postgres` to `postgres12` driver.
